item.title: Slayer Equipment - Helmet - PROPER ints
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

[CENTER]

The Slayer Helmet was released a long time ago. It wasn’t released by me. However, the thread was deleted. The Slayer Helm when released a while ago didn’t have the correct inventory and drop ints. This was fixed today: Friday April 3rd, 2009 by me. I also added the Dissemble options accordingly.

The slayer cape may or may not be released. I haven’t seen one server with the correct skillcape ints. Please see a picture below to see the difference between the proper ints and the ints everyone uses.

Download Model

Ints:

if(i == 7777) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aStringArray189[3] = "Disassemble"; class8.aStringArray189[4] = "Drop"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 10345; class8.anInt165 = 10344; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt202 = 0; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt198 = 1743; class8.anInt181 = 789; class8.anInt155 = 650; class8.anInt200 = 14112; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt169 = -4; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -3; class8.anInt179 = -1; class8.anInt190 = 69; class8.aString170 = "Slayer helmet"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Slayer helmet.".getBytes(); }

Images:

Slayer Cape Compare and Contrast:

ezetra.png763×302

Inventory:

vensbc.png759×326

Side views:

Front and Back views:

Credits:
57% me for re-releasing
30% Zee Best for his online int dumper.
13% for the person who released the models a while back.

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
